name: Twilio
description: The Twilio connector allows you to connect to Twilio, an online service that lets you embed phones, VoIP, and messaging in web, desktop, and mobile software. The connector uses the Twilio REST API to connect to Twilio and work with accounts, applications, calls, messages, and more. The underlying Java classes in the connector use the Twilio Java Helper Library to make the HTTP requests to the Twilio API.

operations.name: getConference
operations.description: Get a conference by its Sid

operations.name: getConferenceList
operations.description: Get a conference list by parameters

operations.name: getParticipant
operations.description: Get a participant of a given conference by call sid of the participant

operations.name: getParticipantList
operations.description: Get a participant list of a conference

operations.name: updateParticipant
operations.description: Updates a participant

operations.name: removeParticipant
operations.description: Removes a participant

operations.name: init
operations.description: Configure Twilio Account with AccountSid and AuthToken

operations.name: getAccount
operations.description: Get the details associated with the account

operations.name: getAccountsList
operations.description: Get the details of all accounts associated with the configured account with the given list filters

operations.name: updateAccount
operations.description: Updates the account (Status can be only changed in sub accounts)

operations.name: createSubAccount
operations.description: Creates a sub account under the pre configured main account

operations.name: createApplication
operations.description: Create a new application given a FriendlyName

operations.name: getApplication
operations.description: Get an application

operations.name: getApplicationList
operations.description: Get a list of applications bound to the account

operations.name: updateApplication
operations.description: Update the parameters of an existing application

operations.name: removeApplication
operations.description: Remove an application from the account

operations.name: getConnectApp
operations.description: Get a connect app from the Sid reference

operations.name: updateConnectApp
operations.description: Update a connect app from the Sid reference

operations.name: getConnectAppList
operations.description: Get a list of all connect app for the account

operations.name: getAuthorizedConnectApp
operations.description: Get an authorized connect app from the Sid reference

operations.name: getAuthorizedConnectAppList
operations.description: Get a list of authorized connect apps for the account

operations.name: sendSms
operations.description: Send SMS

operations.name: getSms

operations.name: getSmsList
operations.description: Returns a list of Incoming and Outgoing SMS Records

operations.name: getShortCode
operations.description: Returns the details of a Short Code associated with your account

operations.name: updateShortCodeProperties
operations.description: Updates the short code's properties

operations.name: getShortCodeList
operations.description: Returns the short codes list associated to an account

operations.name: makeCall
operations.description: Make A Call

operations.description: Get details of a single Incoming or Outgoing Call

operations.name: getCallList

operations.name: getRecordingList

operations.name: deleteRecording

operations.name: sendSms
operations.description: Send SMS

operations.name: getSms
operations.description: Returns Incoming and Outgoing SMS by Message Sid

operations.name: getSmsList
operations.description: Returns a list of Incoming and Outgoing SMS Records

operations.description: Returns the details of a Short Code associated with your account

operations.name: updateShortCodeProperties
operations.description: Updates the short code's properties

operations.description: Returns the short codes list associated to an account

operations.name: getQueue
operations.description: Retrieve a call queue as represented by an SID

operations.name: updateQueue
operations.description: Retrieve a call queue as represented by an SID and update its parameters

operations.name: getQueueList
operations.description: Retrieve the list of queues from the specified account

operations.description: Create a new queue instance and add it to the current account's list of queues

operations.name: getAvailableLocalNumbers
